name: Dog Grooming Glove
imageAlt: Five-finger dog grooming glove with rubber tips for gentle deshedding and massage
shortDescription: A grooming glove that feels like petting — your dog will not even know they are being brushed.
description: Turn grooming from a struggle into a bonding session your dog actually looks forward to. The soft rubber tips on this five-finger glove gently lift loose fur, dirt, and dander while giving your pup a soothing massage. It works on wet or dry coats, so you can even use it during bath time for a deeper clean.
features: 255 soft rubber tips mimic a gentle petting sensation
Works on wet or dry coats — perfect for bath time too
Adjustable velcro wrist strap fits all hand sizes
Collected fur peels off in a single sheet for easy disposal
Stimulates blood circulation and promotes a healthier coat
